info.name: UnifiedAPI_06_DEV_QA Copy
info.description:
Unified.ly provides simple interface to interact with hundreds of applications with no changes.  You can find out more about Unified.ly at [http://unified.ly](https://unified.ly). Category is a high level categorization of all the applications and may frequently change.

Contact Support:
 Email: apiteam@unified.ly
